T04sanss08u:393: cundādhāraṇīṃ vā tāvaj japed yāvat pāpakṣayanimittāni paśyati svapne |
T04sanss08u:394: tad yathā krandanâdichardanadadhikṣīrâdibhojanāt tu vigatapāpo bhavati |
T04sanss08u:395: vamanād vā candrasūryadarśanād ākāśagamanāj jvalitânalamahiṣakṛṣṇapuruṣaparājayād bhikṣubhikṣuṇīsaṃghadarśanāt kṣīravṛkṣagaja vṛṣagirisiṃhâsanaprāsādanâvarohaṇād dharmaśravaṇāc ca pāpakṣayaḥ saṃlakṣayitavyaḥ tathāgatabimbaparivarte 'pi pratipakṣasamudācārôktaḥ |
T04sanss08u:396: tad yathā puruṣo mīḍhâvaliptaḥ sudhautusnānaṃ kṛtvā gandhair vilipyate |
T04sanss08u:397: tasya tad daurgandhyaṃ vāntaṃ vigataṃ syād evaṃ pañcânantaryakāriṇas tat pāpaṃ vigacchati
T04sanss08u:398: yo 'pi daśâkuśalakarmapathasamanvāgatas tathāgate śraddhāṃ pratilabhya tathāgatabimbaṃ kārayet tasyâpi tat pāpaṃ na prajñāyate viśeṣato
T04sanss08u:402: yaś ca khalu punaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitatathāgataṃ saṃmukhaṃ varṣaṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā sarvasukhôpadhānair upatiṣṭhed |
T04sanss08u:403: yaś ca parinirvṛtasya tathāgatasya caitye bodhicittasaṃgṛhītâikapuṣpam āropayet tathāgatapūjāyai janâñjaliṃ côpanāmayej jalena vā siñcayed
T04sanss08u:404: iṣikāpadaṃ vā dadyān nirmālyaṃ câpanayed upalepanapradānaṃ vā puṣpapradānaṃ vā dīpapradānaṃ vā kuryād āttamanāḥ ekakramavyatihāraṃ vâtikramya vācaṃ bhāṣate |
T04sanss08u:405: namas tasmai buddhāya bhagavatêtimātre 'tra siṃhavikrīḍitakāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā yad asau kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā
T04sanss08u:413: ye ca bodhisatvasaṃvaraṃ caturthaṃ śataṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ dhārayanti |
T04sanss08u:414: ye punar abhiniṣkrāntagṛhâvāsā bhikṣavaḥ pañcāśâdhike dve śikṣāpadaśate dhārayanti |
T04sanss08u:416: ye ca yathāparigṛhītāc chikṣāsaṃvarād anyatarāc chikṣāpadād bhraṣṭā bhavanti |
T04sanss08u:417: sacet te durgatibhayabhītās tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyur yathāvibhavataś ca pūjāṃ kuryuḥ |
T04sanss08u:419: atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma |
T04sanss08u:422: yad ahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya guṇān varṇayāmi |
T04sanss08u:423: atha te kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vâtra gambhīre buddhagocare ||
T04sanss08u:425: na me bhadanta bhagavan kāṅkṣā vā vimatir vā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrânteṣu |
T04sanss08u:428: imau bhagavan candrasūryāv evaṃ maharddhikāv evaṃ mahânubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ patetāṃ |
T04sanss08u:430: na tu buddhānāṃ vacanam anyathā bhavet ||
T04sanss08u:431: kiṃtu bhadanta bhagavan santi satvāḥ śraddhêndriyavikalā ye buddhagocaraṃ śrutvā na śraddadhati
T04sanss08u:433: katham idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ smaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasyâittakā guṇânuśaṃsā bhavati |
T04sanss08u:441: asthānam ānandânavakāśo yeṣāṃ tasya nāmadheyaṃ nipatet karṇe teṣāṃ durgatyapāyagamanaṃ bhaved iti |
T04sanss08u:442: duḥśraddhānīyaś cânanda buddhānāṃ buddhagocaraḥ |yac ca tvam ānanda
T04sanss08u:446: abhūmiś câtra śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvâikajātipratibaddhān bodhisatvān mahāsatvān iti ||
T04sanss08u:448: ye cânye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vâṣṭâṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasanti |
T04sanss08u:449: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traivārṣikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayanti |
T04sanss08u:451: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśāyāṃ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātaûpapadyema yatrâmitābhas tathāgataḥ |
T04sanss08u:452: yaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabhavarājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ
T04sanss08u:453: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye 'ṣṭau bodhisatvā ṛddhyâgatya mārgam upadarśayanti |
T04sanss08u:456: teṣāṃ tatrôpapannānāṃ tat pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate |
T04sanss08u:458: te tataś cyutêha manuṣyaloke rājāno bhavanti |
T04sanss08u:460: anekāni satvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśa kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayanti |
T04sanss08u:467: yena ca punar mātṛgrāmeṇa tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaiḍūryaprabharājasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati |
T04sanss08u:481: prāṇâtipātāt prativirato bhavati bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvānām abhayaṃdadaḥ |
T04sanss08u:484: prāṇâtipātahetunā kāyavāṅmanasā karmâvaraṇaṃ kleśâvaraṇaṃ dharmâvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ vā syāt kāritaṃ vânumoditaṃ syāt |
T04sanss08u:485: tat sarvaṃ tena prāṇâtipātavairamaṇacakreṇa sarvânarthaṃ mardayati |
T04sanss08u:487: sanikāyasabhāge devamanuṣyāṇāṃ priyo bhavati nirātaṅko dīrghâyuṣkêti ||
T04sanss08u:488: yāvat punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo bodhisatvo yāvajjīvam adattâdānāt prativirato bhavati sa sarvasatvānām abhayam dadāti anyatrâsayatnenâsaṃkṣobheṇa svalābhena saṃtuṣṭo viharati |
T04sanss08u:491: rmikabhogânabhilāṣī sa tena kuśalamūlena yāvad adattâdānahetukaṃ karmâvaraṇaṃ mardayati pramardayati yāvad aśeṣam avipākaṃ kurutae iti ||
T04sanss08u:492: pe ||evaṃ daśâpi kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ svavipakṣâkuśalaghātakās tatra paṭhyante ||
T04sanss08u:497: kṣapayiṣye pāpakaṃ karma yan mayā purime kṛtam |
T04sanss08u:502: ye buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ yānti na te gacchanti durgatiṃ |
T04sanss08u:503: prahāya mānuṣān kāyān divyān kāyāṃl labhanti te ||
T04sanss08u:504: ity evaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ câdhikṛtya pāpakṣayaḥ ||
T04sanss08u:511: tad yathā kulaputra hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātaṃ |
T04sanss08u:513: na ca tatra tat palaṃ śakyate tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ |
T04sanss08u:519: na ca sarvajñatācittôtpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaḥ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā |
T04sanss08u:520: tad yathā kulaputrâikaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vā layane vā praveśyate sa saha praveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitam api tamondhakāraṃ vidhamayati |
T04sanss08u:522: evam evâikaḥ sarvajñatācittôtpādapradīpo yādṛśe satvâśaye gahane
T04sanss08u:526: tad yathā kulaputra cintāmaṇirājamukuṭānāṃ mahānāgarājñāṃ nâsti
T04sanss08u:528: evam eva bodhicittamahākaruṇācintāmaṇirājamukuṭâvabaddhānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ nâsti durgatyapāyaparôpakramabhayam iti ||
T04sanss08u:530: ihôpāle mahāyānaṃ saṃprasthito bodhisatvaḥ sacet pūrvâhṇakālasamaye āpattim āpadyeta |
T04sanss08u:531: madhyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito vihared aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ
T04sanss08u:532: sacen madhyâhnakālasamaye āpattim āpadyate sāyâhnakālasamaye sarvajñatācittenâvirahito bhaved aparyantâiva bodhisatvasya śīlaskandhaḥ |
T04sanss08u:534: evaṃ hy upāle saparihārā śikṣā mahāyānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ |
T04sanss08u:535: tatra bodhisatvena nâtikaukṛtyaparyutthānam utpādyaṃ nâtivipratisāriṇā bhavitavyaṃ |
T04sanss08u:536: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyaḥ pudgalaḥ punaḥ punar āpattim āpadyeta |
